issue.title: [CF 684] New option for icon border
issue.body:
Is it possible to make a NEW option to hide that default icon border? Sometimes we don't need that border, because it's so ugly.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #684 | Raw

> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

That's Masque thinking it is doing something nice and helpful for its users by putting that ugly crap there. You can get rid of it by going into your Masque settings and disabling skinning for that group (or by changing the skin for that group) (or for the whole addon).

I should add that I think it re-manifested itself (I had it pretty well destroyed there for a while) after I had to make some changes to the way that the texture object that displays that border is created because of some changes that Blizzard made in patch 5.1.
